 ); }; productpage.getInitialProps = async function (context) { let { query: { slug }, } = context; const id = slug ? parseInt(slug.split("-").pop()) : context.query.id; const product = products.map((product) => product.id); return { product: product, }; }; export default withRouter(productpage);
